instructions.name: Game Setup
instructions: Each group should then randomly select one of the 3 Company cards in the deck
Find the first 3 DevOps cards that represent your Company's initial pipeline(as noted on your Company card); lay them face up in front of you.
Shuffle the remaining 33 DevOps cards and place them face down in a pile
Shuffle the Scenario cards and place them face down in another pile

instructions.name: Pipeline Building
instructions: Each player picks a DevOps card from the deck.
Read about the DevOps tools and discuss as a team.
Add one card to your Company's pipeline(unplayed cards stay in your hand and can be played in future rounds).

instructions.name: Scenario Handling
instruction: First check if any Scenarios in the 'backlog' can be handled with your DevOps pipeline
Each player picks a Scenario card.
Each plays their Scenario: If your DevOps pipeline can handle the Scenario, add it to 'dealt with' pile.
If it can't be handled, add it to the 'backlog' pile, you can deal with it in future rounds
